import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import getAccountDetails from '../Hooks/getAccountDetails'; export default function Home() { const [accountData, setAccountData] = useState(null); const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); // Fetch user account details on component mount useEffect(() => { setAccountData(getAccountDetails()); }, []); return (

Happy Friday {accountData ? accountData.name : 'User'}

Savings home

BSB: {accountData ? accountData.bsb : 'cannot retrieve bsb'}

Account Number: {accountData ? accountData.accNo : 'cannot retrieve account number'}

View Account History

{accountData ? "$" + accountData.transAccDetails.balance : 'Null Balance'}

Transaction Account
